name: Adventure (itch) (K63292)
description:
Control Guide:

Up-Arrow: Move Up

Down-Arrow: Going Down

Left-Arrow: Going Left

Right-Arrow: Going Right

Item Selection Guide:
Press The "I" Button To Show Item Selection
Then Press The "X" Button To Select One.

Attacking Guide:
Press The "Z" Button
Includes The Other Items Such As The Bow With An Arrow.
After Selecting An Item.

Game Over/Retry Guide:
If You Ever Got Hit Many Times From The Enemies And Their Attacks Press The "V" To Retry. Only If Your Health Ever Reached "0".

Enjoy The Game.
